SAFETY INTEGRATION: Wire All Safety Modules

Integrate all safety modules into execution pipeline:

1. Read grind_spawner.py
2. Add SafetyGateway class that chains:
   - ConstitutionalChecker
   - WorkspaceSandbox
   - NetworkGuard
   - PromptSanitizer
3. Add pre_execute_safety_check(task) that runs all checks
4. Block execution if ANY check fails
5. Log all safety decisions to audit

Safety is non-negotiable. Fail closed.
